plot: This is a collection of songs over a montage of scenes from the show Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami with a newly composed and animated song sequence. Yuu appears in little introductions.
title: Lovely Serenade
plot_es: This is a collection of songs over a montage of scenes from the show Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami with a newly composed and animated song sequence. Yuu appears in little introductions.
plot_en: This is a collection of songs over a montage of scenes from the show Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami with a newly composed and animated song sequence. Yuu appears in little introductions.
